content: around round 7 *increase 4 single_crochet repeat from * to the decreases are worked as follows insert hook end of the round 48 sts into stitch yarn over pull yarn over out of the stitch two loops are now on the hook insert round 8 single_crochet around hook into next stitch yarn over pull yarn over round 9 *5 single_crochet increase repeat from * to the out of the stitch three loops are now on the end of the round 56 sts hook yarn over pull yarn over through the three loops on the hook one stitch decreased round 10 single_crochet around one loop remains round 11 *increase 6 single_crochet repeat from * to the round 23 *8 single_crochet decrease repeat from * end of the round 64 sts to the end of the round 99 sts round 12 single_crochet around fasten_off yarn weave in the ends and wet block the kippah over a bowl 6 | kippot to knit and crochet ©2024 2025 shaina bilow designs thank you for purchasing this pattern no unauthorized duplication or distribution www shainabilow com @shaina bilow shaina bilow designs
